translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 古びた砦に避難した民間人の一団が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A group of civilians who took refuge in an old fortress,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 広間の中で震え上がっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were trembling inside the great hall.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あぁっ……ここは頑丈な作りになっている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, ah... this place is built sturdy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にだって落とせやしないよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even the demon army couldn't take it down."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そうなんだ……よ、よかった……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-is that so... t-that's good..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい。見回ってきたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey. I've just finished patrolling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ……お疲れ。どうだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah... good work. How is it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「裏門もがっちり閉まってる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The back gate is tightly closed too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれなら開けられないはずだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They shouldn't be able to open it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか、よかったよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I see, that's good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物には開けられない、魔法の門だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's a magical gate that monsters can't open.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きちんと閉まっているなら、大丈夫だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's firmly closed, we should be safe."
"Yeah... but, you see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうした？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...What's wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや。包囲網が分厚い上に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No. On top of the thick siege line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もうずいぶんと、他の人間がいる所から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we've already drifted quite far from where other people are.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 離れちまったようだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems we've become separated."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……戦況も悪い。援軍が来るって夢は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...The battle situation is bad. The dream of reinforcements coming

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 寝てる間しか見られなさそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: seems like something we'll only see in our sleep."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………でも、俺たちだけで囲んでる奴らを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...But there's no way we alone can deal with those who are surrounding us..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうにかするなんて不可能だぞ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's impossible to handle them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ。長期戦……というか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. It's going to be a long battle... or rather...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最悪、餓死まであり得るな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the worst case, starvation is possible..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いや。それでも……諦めてたまるか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No. Even so... I refuse to give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺たちは…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「たっ、たたた！　大変だ！　おい、兵隊さん！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "T-t-t! It's terrible! Hey, soldiers!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうした！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What happened!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、開いちまってる！　裏門が！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, it's open! The back gate!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ままま、魔軍が、そこから……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: D-d-d-demon army is coming in through there...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ――――兵士達の驚愕の声は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ――――The soldiers' cries of amazement,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雪崩れ込む魔軍の轟きの中に、掻き消されていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: were drowned out by the roar of the demon army crashing in.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はーい、魔軍に伝えてきましたよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, I've informed the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、状況は見ての通り、ですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, as you can see, that's the situation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒声、喚声、叫声。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shouts, screams, cries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日間足止めされていたせいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps because they had been held up for several days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虐殺の声は、砦の外にも聞こえるほどだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sounds of massacre could be heard even outside the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、子供も死にますねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, even the children die, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女も死にますねー。大漁大漁」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Women die too. What a haul, what a haul."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうせ、死ぬ命だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...They're lives doomed to die anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦の入口を斬り捨てた剣を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios silently sheathed the sword he had used to cut down the entrance of the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスは音もなく背中に収めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He quietly put it away on his back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これでエスクードソードも少しは……おや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this, the Escudo Sword will be a little more... Oh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう行くんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're leaving already?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「事は済んだ。もう、用はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The matter is settled. I have no more business here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狂乱の宴の中に混じる悲鳴に背を向けて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Turning his back on the screams mixed in the frenzied feast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者は、旅の続きへと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero returned to continue his journey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者の活躍で、魔軍が勢いづいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the hero's actions, the demon army gained momentum.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ああ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怒声、喚声、叫声。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shouts, screams, cries.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日間足止めされていたせいか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps because they had been held up for several days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 虐殺の声は、砦の外にも聞こえるほどだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The sounds of massacre could be heard even outside the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いやー、子供も死にますねー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Wow, even the children die, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女も死にますねー。大漁大漁」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Women die too. What a haul, what a haul."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……どうせ、死ぬ命だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...They're lives doomed to die anyway."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 砦の入口を斬り捨てた剣を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arios silently sheathed the sword he had used to cut down the entrance of the fortress.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アリオスは音もなく背中に収めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He quietly put it away on his back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これでエスクードソードも少しは……おや。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this, the Escudo Sword will be a little more... Oh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう行くんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You're leaving already?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「事は済んだ。もう、用はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The matter is settled. I have no more business here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 狂乱の宴の中に混じる悲鳴に背を向けて。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Turning his back on the screams mixed in the frenzied feast.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者は、旅の続きへと戻っていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The hero returned to continue his journey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勇者の活躍で、魔軍が勢いづいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to the hero's actions, the demon army gained momentum.
